column2: "Na ohun nyimpadodow no
column3: ɔkɔr koko no do

column2: "Na obuee n'ano kyerɛkyerɛɛ hɔn dɛ:"
"Nhyira aka sunsum mu ehiafo
column3: na hɔn na ɔsor ahenman no yɛ hɔndze."

column2: "Nhyira aka hɔn a hɔn werɛ ahow
column3: na hɔn na wɔbɛkyekye hɔn werɛ."

column2: "Nhyira aka abrɛfo
column3: na hɔn na wobenya asaase no edzi do."

column2: "Nhyira aka hɔn a tsenenee ho ɔkɔm nye nsukɔm dze hɔn
column3: na hɔn na wɔbɛma wɔamee."

column2: "Nhyira aka mbɔbɔrhufo
column3: na hɔn na wobohu hɔn mbɔbɔr."

column2: "Nhyira aka hɔn a hɔn akoma mu tsew
column3: na hɔn na wobohu Nyankopɔn."

column2: "Nhyira aka esiesiefo
column3: na hɔn na wɔbɛfrɛ hɔn Nyankopɔn mba."

column2: "Nhyira aka hɔn a tsenenee ntsi wɔahaw hɔn
column3: na hɔn na ɔsor ahenman no yɛ hɔndze."

column2: "Nhyira aka hom ber a wɔbɛyaw hom
column3: na wɔahaw hom
column4: na wɔaka nsɛmbɔn nyina ato hom do akɔhwi mu

column2: "Hom ndzi dɛw na hom ho nsɛpɛw hom
column3: na hom akatua so wɔ sor; na dɛmara na wɔhaaw nkɔnhyɛfo a wodzii hom kan no."

column2: "Hom nye asaase do nkyen; na sɛ nkyen no ayew ne dɛw a
column3: wɔdze ebɛnadze bɛhyɛ no nkyen? Onnye mma hwee bio
column4: na mbom wɔtow gu ma nyimpa tsiatsia do."

column2: "Hom nye wiadze kan no. Kurow a ɔda koko do nntum nnsuma."
"Eso wɔnnsɔ kandzea mmfa nnsi kuruw ase; na wɔdze si kandzeadua do
column3: ma ɔhyerɛn ma hɔn a wɔwɔ fie nyina."

column2: "Ne dɛm ntsi
column3: hom mma hom kan no nhyerɛn wɔ nyimpa enyim
column4: ama woeehu hom ndwuma pa na wɔaahyɛ hom Egya a ɔwɔ sor no enyimnyam."

column2: "Mma hom nndwen dɛ mebae dɛ merebɛsɛɛ mbra no anaa nkɔnhyɛfo no: dabida
column3: mammbɛsɛɛ

column2: "Na nokwar mese hom dɛ
column3: Sor nye asaase nnyae nntwaa mu yi
column4: akyerɛwdze kor anaadɛ nsensanee kor mpo nnkefi mbra no ho etwa mu
column5: gyedɛ ne nyina ahyɛ ma ana."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi obiara a ɔbɔto mbransɛm nketseaba yi mu kor
column3: na ɔbɛkyerɛkyerɛ nyimpa dɛm no
column4: wɔbɛfrɛ no aketseaba wɔ sor ahenman no mu; na obiara a ɔbɛyɛ na ɔbɛkyerɛkyerɛ no
column5: ɔno na wɔbɛfrɛ no ɔkɛse wɔ sor ahenman no mu."

column2: "Na mese hom dɛ gyedɛ hom tsenenee kyɛn Akyerɛwfo no nye Farisiifo no hɔn tsenenee
column3: ɔno hom nnkɛhɛn sor ahenman no mu da."

column2: "Hom atse dɛ wɔkaa kyerɛɛ tsetsefo no dɛ
column3: Mma nndzi ewu
column4: na obiara a obedzi ewu no
column5: obedzi fɔ wɔ atsɛmbu no mu;"

column2: "na emi dze mese hom dɛ
column3: Obiara a no bo fuw no nua gyan
column4: obedzi atsɛmbu no mu fɔ; na obiara a ɔbɛse no nua
column6: obedzi fɔ wɔ mpanyimfo bagua mu; na obiara a ɔbɛse
column8: obedzi fɔ akɔ amandzehu kurow mu gya no mu."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi sɛ edze w'ayɛyɛdze ba afɔrmbukyia no ho
column3: na sɛ ekaa wɔ hɔ dɛ wo nua wɔ wo ho asɛm bi a
column5: "gyaa w'ayɛyɛdze wɔ afɔrmbukyia no enyim hɔ
column6: na dzi kan kɔ nye wo nua nkɔbɔ mu

column2: "Enye wo tamfo mbɔ mu ntsɛm ber a enye no wɔ kwan mu no; amma da bi wo tamfo eennyi wo annhyɛ ɔtsɛmbuafo nsa
column3: na ɔtsɛmbuafo no eennyi wo annhyɛ ɔsomfo nsa

column2: "Nokwar mese wo dɛ
column3: Innkefi hɔ gyedɛ etua kapɛrba biara a aka ekyir no ana."

column2: "Hom atse dɛ wɔkaa dɛ
column3: Mma nnto awar;"

column2: "na emi dze mese hom dɛ
column3: Obiara a ɔhwɛ ɔbaa dɛ no kɔn dɔ no no
column4: ɔafa no dada wɔ n'akoma mu."

column2: "Na sɛ w'enyiwa nyimfa to wo fintsidua a
column3: tu na tow fi woho kyen: na oye ma wo dɛ wo nyimpadua ne fa kor bɛsɛɛ na wɔammfa wo nyimpadua nyina annkɔto amandzehu kurow mu."

column2: "Na sɛ wo nsa nyimfa to wo fintsidua a
column3: twa na tow fi woho kyen: na oye ma wo dɛ ebɔhwer wo nyimpadua ho beebi na wo nyimpadua nyina nnkɔkɔ amandzehu kurow mu."

column2: "Wɔkae so dɛ
column3: Obiara a obegyaa ne yer awar no
column4: ma ɔmma no awargu no ho krataa;"

column2: "naaso emi dze
column3: mese hom dɛ
column5: ber a basia no mmbɔɔ edwaman no
column6: ɔma basia no to awar; na obiara a ɔbɔwar nyia woegyaa no no

column2: "Bio hom atse dɛ wɔkaa kyerɛɛ tsetsefo no dɛ
column3: Mma nnka ntanhun

column2: "na emi dze
column3: mese hom dɛ
column4: Mma hom nnka ntam koraa: mma hom nnka ɔsor

column2: "mma hom nnka asaase
column3: osiandɛ ɔyɛ n'ananadzegua; mma hom nnka Jerusalɛm
column4: osiandɛ ɔyɛ ɔhen kɛse no kurow."

column2: "Eso mma mmfa wo tsir nnka ntam
column3: osiandɛ irunntum nnyɛ nhwi kor fufuw anaa tuntum."

column2: "Na hom mma hom Nyew
column3: nyɛ Nyew; na hom Oho
column4: nnyɛ Oho; osiandɛ biribi a ɔkyɛn yinom fi bɔn mu."

column2: "Hom atse dɛ wɔkaa dɛ
column3: Enyiwa nsi enyiwa ananmu

column2: "naaso emi dze
column3: mese hom dɛ
column4: Mma hom nye ɔbɔnfo no nndzi esi; mbom sɛ obi bɔ wo sotɔr wɔ w'enyimfa a
column5: dan bankum no so ma no;"

column2: "na sɛ obi pɛ dɛ ɔnye wo dzi asɛm
column3: na ɔgye w'asetar a
column4: ma ɔmfa wo nkatado no so;"

column2: "na obiara a ɔbɛhyɛ wo dɛ enye no nkɔ ɔkwansin kor no
column3: enye no nkɔ ebien."

column2: "Nyia ɔserɛ wo no
column3: ma no; nyia ɔpɛ dɛ ɔfɛm wɔ wo hɔ no
column4: mma nndan woho mmfi no ho."

column2: "Hom atse dɛ wɔkaa dɛ
column3: Dɔ wo nyɛnko na tan wo tamfo;"

column2: "naaso emi dze
column3: mese hom dɛ
column5: na hom nsɔr mma hɔn a wɔhaw hom;"

column2: "ama hom aayɛ hom Egya a ɔwɔ sor no ne mba: na ɔma n'ewia fir wɔ nyimpa bɔn nye nyimpa pa do
column3: na ɔtɔ nsu gu hɔn a wɔtsen nye hɔn a wɔnntsen do."

column2: "Na sɛ hom dɔ hɔn a wɔdɔ hom a
column3: ebɛn akatua na hom nya? Ana atowgyefo no so nnyɛ dɛmara?"

column2: "Na sɛ hom kyia hom nuanom nko a
column3: ebɛnadze na hom ayɛ abor do? Ana amanamamfo no so nnyɛ dɛmara?"

column2: "Dɛm ntsi hom ndzi mu
column3: dɛ mbrɛ hom sor Egya no dzi mu."
